sub_title: Project Manager at CASALE PROJECT a. s.
summary: I am a reliable project manager with more than 15 years of experience in managing and implementing international, multidisciplinary technical projects in the energy / chemical industry. My technical knowledge, organized work, good interpersonal relationships and communication skills, leadership, innovative and creative approach ensure that projects are prepared and executed in the highest standards. I can manage large and complex projects. I control project costs within the budget, ensure project completion according to schedule.

projects.title: Melamine 2, Metafrax, Gubakha - project suspended
projects.description: Lead and coordinate Melamine 2, METAFRAX project (Urea, Melamine and Water Treatment Plant).

projects.title: UREA Plant 2,200MTD, TOAZ, Togliatti
projects.description: Construction of New UREA plant with total capacity of 2,200MTD.

contributors.headline: Project Manager at CASALE PROJECT a. s.

projects.title: Litvinov / Czechia - MAC A/B Cooling water system upgrade
projects.description: Replacement of rusted DN800 pipe, conect two independent CW supplies and implementation of filtration systems for particals bigger than 2.5mm. (Water flow is 1,600 m3/hr per machine). Project development, construction and completion in 6 months.

contributors.headline: Project Manager at CASALE PROJECT a. s.

projects.title: Kedziezryn-Kozle / Poland - ASU TSA vessels replacement
projects.description: I executed this project as Site Construction manager. Task was to replace two TSA vessels (120 tuns), related pipework (36'' and 42'' diam, length 80m including valves and check valves) and modify vessels foundarion during 9 days. Thanks to contractor (Mostostal Zabre), high quality of project preparation (Filip Majewski) we managed to get modiffied plant back to operation with high level of Air Products safety standards. Contractors work in 2 shifts, 24/7.

contributors.headline: Project Manager at CASALE PROJECT a. s.

projects.title: Mosnov / Czechia - 7HPN Nitrogen Generator construction & Back ip extension

contributors.headline: Project Manager at CASALE PROJECT a. s.

profile_positions.description:
I am responsible for all stages of EPC Projects (project value 50 – 200MM EUR).

•	Responsible for technical, financial and organizational part of the project

•	Lead directly local Site Manager, supervise organization of site works

•	Manage
o	all technical disciplines involved in the projects
o	project team
o	the claims of the customers
o	the relationship with the Customer and Partners for technical and quality matters of the design and for Customers approval and/or comments of documents
o	Call the Procurement Department’s attention to the conditions for applying penalties or corrective actions to the suppliers for non-performance of the contract and estimate their value, with the cooperation of the Inspection & Expediting Section
o	Coordinating local site works with Prague/Lugano office activities (Engineering, Procurement, Finance, HR)

•	Represent the company in all contract matters during the project execution

•	Prepare the Project Execution Plan with the cooperation of the project team and the Department Heads and monitor its application

•	Monitor the overall work progress and take suitable measures to prevent delays, financial exposures due to delays in opening letters of credit or in credit collection, circumstances adverse to project objectives and to stay within the budget

•	Approve
o	the requests for changes in the Project, record them in the Project Modification Register and submit request of variations to client when it is the case
o	Approve the Suppliers’ invoices
o	Authorize any extra-work
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
I managed technical projects in Europe (CZ / SK / PL) from 100k to 15MM Euro. I start from the initial design, cost estimating, preparing the schedule, presenting the results to the management / customer, leading the actual implementation to the project completion, commissioning and handing over to operation, completing documentation.

•	I lead a life extension projects / contract roll (10 years) of Technology Air Separation Unit (ASU) for production in Litvinov / CZ. I prepared one of the technical solutions for life extension for ASU in Glogow / PL. This is in preparation and cost estimation of dozens projects that are in one comprehensive package. These projects are e.g.:
o	Replacement of piping systems and vessels.
o	Renovation of automatic valves and instrumentation.
o	Increasing reliability by replacing parts of specific technological units (compressors, coolers, frequency converters, etc.)
o	Replacement and modification of control systems.

•	I designed, cost estimated and implemented new or existing Compress Dry Air systems (CDA) such as:
o	Replacement of cooling towers for the CDA system in Teplice.
o	Project preparation, presentation and negotiation with the customer about complete renewal of the compressor station and treatment.

•	I prepared projects for relocation of hydrogen filling stations to new locations (CZ / SK).

•	I managed the preparation and construction of nitrogen generators.

•	Nitrogen / oxygen backup (s):
o	Preparation and construction of emergency nitrogen backup for a new polyethylene unit.
o	Preparation for nitrogen backup expansion (200MT / 5,500Nm3 / hr).

•	Pipe modifications
o	Modification of critical piping (reliability increase) to nitrogen backup.
o	Automation of parallel oxygen vent from low pressure oxygen reservoir.
o	Preparation of projects related to cooling water piping replacement including a new filtration strategy (DN80-DN800).

o	Pipework replacement and related modifications for oxygen, nitrogen and CDA.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Management of technical projects in Europe (CZ / SK / PL / GE)

•	I led projects from initial concept through to commissioning and handover to the value of Euro 20k to 2MM, such as the example:
o	Planning, managing and coordinating shutdowns, implementing multiple projects.
o	Technological modifications and automation on the hydrogen post-treatment / filling ctation in Stade / Germany.
o	Removal of nitrogen generator and modification of related technological equipment in cooperation with construction of new ASU in Teplice.
o	Oxygen vents replacement Czestochowa / Poland.
o	Removal of nitrogen and oxygen generator in Sokolov.
o	CDA compressor room modification and new compressor installation.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
1. Assignment: 03 / 2008-01 / 2009 – Pressure systems
Implementation of pressure system elements in Poland into SAP system according to company standards.

2. Assignment: 02 / 2009-10 / 2009 - PICS (Proces Instrumentation Constol Systems)
Modification of control systems (Allan Bradley) and HMI (Wonderware InTouch) for nitrogen and oxygen generators.

3. Assignment: 11 / 2009-06 / 2010 – Machinery
Compressors, pumps, fans, etc. and their analysis, modification or reaction to the current operating state.

4. Assignment: 07 / 2010-02 / 2011 – Maintenance of cryogenic semi-trailers.
Preparation of spare parts warehouses strategy for fleet maintenance.

•	Test preparation and planning (functional / life).

•	Preparation of technical reports.
•	Presentation of management results.
